events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position. Our recruitment team will review it shortly and get back to you.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering department based on your experience and resume content.
A recruiter specializing in software engineering roles has been assigned to your application and will be guiding you through the next steps.
The initial screening call was completed today. You demonstrated strong fundamentals and relevant experience for the Software Engineer role.
Thank you for your prompt response confirming availability for the upcoming technical interview session scheduled on May 7th.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 7th at 9 AM UTC. Please be prepared to discuss your previous projects and coding challenges.
You successfully completed the technical interview with our engineering panel. The feedback was excellent, highlighting your problem-solving and coding skills.
Following your technical interview, we have scheduled an HR interview on May 10th at 2 PM UTC to discuss your fit with company culture and benefits.
Your HR interview was completed today. The HR team appreciated your enthusiasm and alignment with our companyâ€™s values and mission.
We are excited to offer you the position of Software Engineer. The official offer letter with details has been sent to your email address.
We have received your positive feedback on the offer. You expressed your eagerness to join and contribute to our engineering team.
You have formally accepted the job offer. Welcome aboard! We look forward to starting your onboarding process shortly.
Your onboarding has officially begun. You will receive schedules, access credentials, and materials necessary to start your journey with us.
The hiring process for the Software Engineer position is now closed. We are thrilled to have you join our engineering team and achieve great things together.
